title: Sub Power Up
content:
Sub Power Up is an ability in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3.

Sub Power Up improves the performance of sub weapons.

When a player places a Squid Beakon they become the 'owner' of it, and a certain number of Quick Super Jump AP is added only to all jumps using that specific Squid Beakon. That number is determined by the amount of Sub Power Up that the 'owner' has, and can be found in the following table.

Sub Power Up is the main ability of:

- ▲ For Ink Mines, the ability now also increases the duration of time opponents remain marked.

- ▲ For Sprinklers, the ability increases the duration of time the Sprinkler sprays ink at maximum power by roughly 150%.

- ▲ For the Point Sensor, the ability now also increases the duration of time opponents remain marked.

- ▲ For the Squid Beakon, the ability increases the effect of reducing super jump time by roughly 50%.

- ▲ For the Squid Beakon, the benefits are now more likely to occur, even with fewer AP.

- Increases the duration the Angle Shooter is marked on a player.

Sub Power Up is the main ability of:
